properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing-to prevent bank erosion

Vegetative cover improving along the river banks with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Epala/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and pla
